Luxury Appliance Repair in Pasadena, CA

White-Glove Service for Homes Where Heritage Meets Modern Elegance

In Pasadena, tradition and innovation live side by side—from the stately estates of Oak Knoll to the contemporary homes tucked into Linda Vista. Whether you live in a historic Craftsman masterpiece or a sleek architectural marvel, your luxury appliances play a vital role in your lifestyle. When they require attention, you deserve service that respects the craftsmanship and quality of your home.

At Luxury Appliance Repair by Zaricci, we proudly offer high-end appliance repair in Pasadena, specializing in elite brands like Sub-Zero, Wolf, Thermador, Miele, Gaggenau, Viking, La Cornue, and more. We combine factory-certified expertise, genuine OEM parts, and white-glove service trusted by Pasadena’s most discerning homeowners.

🔧 Why Pasadena Homeowners Trust ZARICCI

  • ✅ Factory-Certified in Luxury Brands
    Our technicians are trained to work on today's most advanced and prestigious appliances, including integrated refrigeration, smart kitchen systems, and professional cooking ranges.
  • ✅ Genuine OEM Parts for Lasting Results
    We use manufacturer-certified parts only—protecting your appliance’s performance, maintaining warranty validity, and ensuring long-term reliability.
  • ✅ Same-Day or Next-Day Service
    We offer priority scheduling throughout Pasadena, arriving on time and ready to deliver fast, professional results without disruption to your home or routine.
  • ✅ White-Glove In-Home Service
    We work cleanly, discreetly, and respectfully—protecting floors, cabinetry, and surfaces—so the only sign we were ever there is an appliance working like new.

🛠️ What We Repair in Pasadena

❄️ Luxury Refrigerators & Freezers

  • Sub-Zero, Thermador, Miele
  • Temperature fluctuations, cooling issues
  • Ice maker failures or dispenser malfunctions
  • Door seal, compressor, or smart system repairs

🔥 Ranges, Wall Ovens & Cooktops

  • Wolf, La Cornue, Gaggenau, Viking
  • Ignition failure, uneven heating, or convection fan issues
  • Smart system diagnostics and control panel repairs
  • Steam oven and dual-fuel range repairs

🚿 Luxury Dishwashers

  • Miele, Bosch, Cove
  • Water drainage problems, leaks, or incomplete cycles
  • Poor cleaning performance or smart connectivity issues

🧺 Luxury Washers & Dryers

  • Miele, Fisher & Paykel, LG Signature
  • Washer not spinning or draining properly
  • Dryer overheating or control board failures
  • App and smart home integration troubleshooting

☕ Built-In Specialty Appliances

  • Wine coolers, espresso machines, warming drawers, steam ovens
  • Temperature inconsistencies
  • Water flow, motor, and smart system repairs

👨‍🔧 The ZARICCI White-Glove Repair Process

  1. Effortless Booking
    Book online or call us. Our team handles every detail, coordinating around your schedule for a seamless experience.
  2. On-Time, Professional Diagnosis
    A certified ZARICCI technician arrives on time, fully prepared to diagnose your appliance quickly and accurately.
  3. Transparent, Written Estimate
    We provide a clear, itemized quote before beginning any work—no hidden charges, ever.
  4. Precision Repairs with OEM Parts
    Repairs are performed to factory standards, using genuine parts that ensure peak performance and durability.
  5. Final Testing & Immaculate Clean-Up
    After extensive testing, we leave your appliance—and your home—flawless and ready to use, backed by a satisfaction guarantee.
